revised_title: On the Summation of Series and Their Convergence
tldr: The author presents a method for finding the sum of a series with a given general term and discusses the conditions for convergence of the series. The method involves reducing the series into a converging series and finding the values of the unknown quantity x between which the series converges. The author also explains how to deduce the sum of all infinite series of a specific formula using independent sums of infinite series.
